shadow.name: LIMITATION
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of Limitation, expressing through limitation

gift.name: REALISM
gift.description: The gift frequency of Limitation, expressing through realism

siddhi.name: JUSTICE
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of Limitation, expressing through justice

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 60 shadow frequency. The limitation you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural realism. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from limitation to realism.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your root. Notice the sensation of limitation.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 60 consciously for 7 days, the limitation pattern will shift toward realism.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 60 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from limitation toward realism
